items.title: Starmer pledges to close loopholes in social media crackdown
items.summary: The government's new plans will mean no online platform will get a "free pass" on children's safety on the internet, the prime minister says.

items.title: Stroke survivors trial new at-home tech: 'It's given me my freedom back'
items.summary: Participants in the NHS 'Triceps' trial wear a device in their ear which emits electrical pulses while they do rehab.

items.title: John Wick game starring Keanu Reeves unveiled at PlayStation showcase
items.summary: It's not the first time the iconic hitman has appeared in games, but Saber's will be the first voiced by Reeves.

items.title: Amazon's Ring ends deal with surveillance firm after backlash
items.summary: A Super Bowl advert had sparked new scrutiny of the smart doorbell company's privacy practices.

items.title: AI coding platform's flaws allow BBC reporter to be hacked
items.summary: Vibe-coding tools - which let people without coding skills create apps using AI - are exploding in popularity.

items.title: Porn site fined £800,000 for not rolling out age checks
items.summary: Separately, message board 4chan says it will refuse to pay an expected £520,000 fine from the media regulator.
